title: Europa Universalis III + Napoleons Ambitions fully patched
description:
Europa Universalis + Napoleons Ambition + patched to 2.2

Following a farcical mess when attempting to add the Napoleon 2.0 update from other torrents, more farce when trying to update to the latest 2.2 patch I&#039;ve done this.....my first torrent, so it&#039;ll probly fail :O)


simply....

remove any existing installs of EU3 
Extract to C:\Program files,
copy the shortcut from the Paradox Interactive folder to your desktop
double click the eu3.reg file entries to populate the registry.
kiss your family goodbye

Conquer the world.
